abstract: Disney will initially pay $563.2 million for Playdom and will make $200 million in additional payments if Playdom achieves unannounced growth goals.
snippet: Disney will initially pay $563.2 million for Playdom and will make $200 million in additional payments if Playdom achieves unannounced growth goals.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The Walt Disney Company on Tuesday became Hollywood’s leader in the booming social game business by acquiring Playdom in a deal worth as much as $763.2 million.

headline.main: Disney Buys Playdom in $763 Million Deal, Becoming Hollywood Leader in Social Games
headline.print_headline: Disney Buys Playdom in $763 Million Deal, Becoming Hollywood Leader in Social Games

byline.original: By Brooks Barnes and Claire Cain Miller

abstract: Google has been holding talks with gaming companies as it looks to develop a new service to compete with Facebook in the social networking sphere, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
snippet: Google has been holding talks with gaming companies as it looks to develop a new service to compete with Facebook in the social networking sphere, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Google in Talks to Build Rival to Facebook
